body: Divine spellcasters gain new spells as follows.
name: New Divine Spells

sections.body: Characters who can cast divine spells undertake a certain amount of study between adventures. Each time such a character receives a new level of divine spells, she learns all of the spells from that level automatically.
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Divine Spells/New Divine Spells/Spells Gained at a New Level
sections.name: Spells Gained at a New Level

sections.body: A divine spellcaster can also research a spell independently, much as an arcane spellcaster can. Only the creator of such a spell can prepare and cast it, unless she decides to share it with others.
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Divine Spells/New Divine Spells/Independent Research
sections.name: Independent Research
